note:
I discuss the world's darkness in frank terms. Often, this is not a happy space.

I sometimes post links to longer essays at my Wordpress blog: https://hauntedtimber.wordpress.com/

👉 No warranty is provided for anything produced herein. Contents may be broken upon arrival, more often than not. Caveat emptor.

👉 Reply guys/people encouraged to fuck off.

👉 I regularly mute notifications for my threads. The Void hears your cries but I do not.

she/her • trans femme • bi
❄️ Minnesota ❄️
Just a trans girl looking to discover who she is.

Climate scientist at UCLA & NCAR studying extreme events like floods, droughts, and wildfires. For the time being, this Mastodon account will mostly be used to automatically repost my Twitter content--I am not continuously monitoring replies or messages.

Now I write video #transcoding scripts and sometimes podcast.
